description: Write a function called `reverse_string(s)` that returns the reversed version of the input string.
output_specification: Expected output format will be shown.
explanations: Empty string reversed is still empty
notes: Python provides slicing syntax for reversing: s[::-1]
Works with any string including empty strings and single characters
hints: Use Python's string slicing with negative step
The slice notation [::-1] reverses a sequence
Alternatively, use reversed() function with join()
